dmca.title: [EV1-C2062286T] Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Sent: Thursday, December 07, 2006 12:50 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [EV1-C2062286T] Copyright Infringement

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright Infringement
Added by system at Thursday, Dec 7 2006 06:46 am
X-MailFrom: rh1988@gmail.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net

<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Thu Dec 7 06:45:48 2006

  Thu, 7 Dec 2006 06:45:09 -0600

Message-ID:
<44d1f6cf0612070417g177a0646j642fdf100269ed7b@mail.gmail.com>
Date: Thu, 7 Dec 2006 12:17:16 +0000
From: "RH Serve Abuse" <abuse@rhserve.com>
Sender: rh1988@gmail.com
To: abuse@theplanet.com, webmaster@weirdauctions.com,
admin@sellatauctions.com
Subject: Copyright Infringement
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1; format=flowed
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
Content-Disposition: inline
X-Google-Sender-Auth: de5617b56ca95abe
Received-SPF: pass (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: domain of gmail.com
designates 72.14.204.238 as permitted sender) client-ip=72.14.204.238;
envelope-from=rh1988@gmail.com; helo=qb-out-0506.google.com;
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 07 Dec 2006 12:45:09.0580 (UTC)
FILETIME=[879A38C0:01C719FD] 

MIME element (text/plain)
To:
abuse@theplanet.com,webmaster@weirdauctions.com,admin@sellatauctions.com

 
Dear Sir/Madam, 
 
The following page is offering one of our products for sale which I own
full rights to.  We have never sold resell rights.  Therefore I would
ask that this page and all related pages/files are removed immediately
otherwise I will be forced to seek legal action including but not
limited to loss of revenue as a direct result of your actions. 
 
http://m2scripts.com/myspace-generators/wavyscroller.php 
 
I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am the
copyright owner of these intellectual property rights -
http://www.pinchpoke.com 
 
In accordance with the provisions the Digital Millennium Copyright Act
of
1998: 
 
Please expeditiously "take down" the infringing material. 
 
I further aver that the information contained in the Notice is accurate.

 
We sincerely appreciate your immediate attention to this important
matter. 
--
Truthfully, 
 
R.Hamill 
 
RH Serve - Abuse
